p:
Double digest restriction-site-associated DNA sequencing ( 40) was used to generate a genomic dataset containing tens of thousands of anonymous genetic loci from across the species genomes ( 41). The final dataset for M. escalerai included 18,356 SNPs, 216 individual bats, and a genotyping rate of 0.906. The final dataset for M. crypticus included 20,750 SNPs, 57 individual bats, and a genotyping rate of 0.894 (see Datasets S2 and S3 and
SI Appendix for library preparation and bioinformatics).
